class.name: BehaviorTree
class.description: [BehaviorTree] is a hierarchical structure used to model and control the behavior of agents in a game. It is composed of tasks that represent specific actions or decision-making rules. The [BehaviorTree] is executed from the root task down to the leaf tasks, which represent the actual actions or behaviors that the agent should perform. See also [BTTask] class.

method.name: clone
method.description: Makes a copy of behavior tree.

method.name: get_root_task
method.description: Returns root task of the [BehaviorTree] resource.

method.name: instantiate
method.description: Instantiates behavior tree and returns the root [BTTask].

method.name: set_root_task
method.description: Assign new root task to [BehaviorTree] resource.
